```{r}
# Load the swiss dataset
data(swiss)

# Create a correlation matrix
correlation_matrix <- cor(swiss)

# Create a regression table
regression_table <- summary(lm(Fertility ~ ., data = swiss))


```

```{r, include = FALSE}
# Convert the R dataframe to a Python object
py$swiss <- r_to_py(swiss)
py$correlation_matrix <- r_to_py(correlation_matrix)
py$regression_table <- r_to_py(regression_table)


```

```{python, echo = FALSE}
# Python code
import seaborn as sns
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# Plot the 'Fertility' column
sns.histplot(swiss['Fertility'])
plt.show()

```
